resources.string: Do you want to delete this item?
To use this app, you need to also install phone app.

Watch companion is not installed. This app will not work properly.

If your watch is running Android Wear 1.x, then you do not have to do anything, app will be installed automatically in few minutes at most.

If your watch is running Anroid Wear 2, please click 'Open Store' button below to open Play Store on the watch and install companion app.
If not automatically attached, please manually attach %1$s from the phone\'s internal storage to the created e-mail.\n\nFeel free to delete the file after sending it.
Failed to retrieve log data from the watch. Check the watch connection and retry.
